callout1.title: Tax reform
callout1.desc: Stay informed throughout the tax reform legislative process with this toolkit. It features the latest news and action items for retail real estate professionals.

callout2.title: ADA lawsuit reform
callout2.desc: Congress should restore the integrity of the American Disabilities Act by providing clearer rules for identifying and correcting access violations.

callout3.title: E-Fairness
callout3.desc: This legislation modernizes the sales tax collection system and levels the playing field between online-only sellers and brick and mortar retailers.
